name: Bus driver Tiny Story
description:
Important!

I exported the .exe file again due to an assets error in the previous file. I hope everything it's ok now. The html5 version works relatively well on chrome and it's an alternative(not smooth as it should though).

Story

A broke family during the financial crisis of Ecuador in 1999, looking for a better life. This is a very short game made for the VimJam 2020.

Mechanics

This game has a mobile oriented mechanic, where you just need to press the space bar or mouse click. It's like a vertical flappy bird mix with platforms.
